means: <文>（手拿或戴在衣服上的）小花束，（尤指有香味的）花束

word_mean: 花束，束：指形似一小束花的解剖结构

sentence.Network_en: Every tree, every hedge is a nosegay.
sentence.Network_cn: 每一棵树, 每一片篱笆,是一束芬芳的花朵.

sentence.Network_en: Dream nosegay , mean to have to get, the ability on good terms luck.
sentence.Network_cn: 梦见花束, 意味着有所获, 能交好运.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 与鼻子有关的英文短语和习惯用语 ... nosegas n. 喷性毒气 nosegay n. (芳香的)花束 nose-led adj. 任人牵着鼻子走的.
1000hook | 思语 ... 701 ghost n. 鬼魂，幽灵 207 nosegay 小花束 457 relic 遗迹，遗物，遗产.

list.abs: dream nosegay , mean to have to get , the ability on good terms luck .梦见花束，意味着有所获，能交好运。
Mr Phillipson's book includes a pen-and-ink caricature of Smith a bubble of contemplation , holding a nosegay to ward off Edinburgh's stench .菲利普森笔下的传记收入了一副钢笔漫画，画中亚当?斯密沉思冥想，手持花束来抵挡爱丁堡散发的恶臭。
the blossom which dreams nosegay withers away , the wishes will not carry out , the romance will break off .梦见花束的花朵枯萎，愿望不会实现，恋情会中断。
the lover dreams nosegay , the love will be deeper .恋人梦见花束，爱情会更深。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from nose + gay in the obsolete sense 'ornament'

means.word_mean: 1. an arrangement of flowers that is usually given as a present
